Plintissa heard Liono's annoucment as she was walking by the Maximal
base....she pulled out a piece of paper and wrote something on it with her
own blood, since she didn't have a pen....she fashioned a box from some
plant pieces...she placed the note into the box..then she placed the 3
weapons she stole from the Maximal base in them...she put it by the front
door of the Maximal base and left...the note said: thanks for the
understanding, ha! anyway, i couldn't live with the guilt and decided to
give back what i stole...don't expect anything else though, well, i'm
running out of mech fluid, so goodbye Liono...goodbye to the Maximals who
stay, and goodbye, Iron Raptor...you were my only
friend......Plintissa......end of note...Plintissa walked away from the
base, guilt free...and otherwise FREE!...she walked over to a clearing
between all 3 bases and started to construct her own base.....it would take
a long time, but she brought some technoligy in her ship, including stuff to
make a CR Chamber, so she was set....she looked around to make sure nobody
was looking then started contructing.....
----- Original Message -----
From: <RgDaN@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 17, 2000 4:58 PM
Subject: Neo Beast Wars Free Choice


> Liono: Key can we continue this later  ::Goes on loud speaker:: OK LET ME
> CLEAR SOMETHING UP TO ALL THE MAXIMALS NOBODY IS FORCING YOU TO STAY IN MY
> BASE YOU CAN LEAVE whenever YOUR READY. BUT FROM ON OUT SHUT UP AND DEAL
WITH
> IT FOR NO BOT WALKS INTO ANOTHER BOTS HOME AND DISRESPECTS HIM. AND I'M
NOT
> GOING TO BEG ANYONE TO STAY SO ANYBODY THAT DOESN'T WANT TO FOLLOW MY
COMMAND
> IS WELCOME TO LEAVE. AT ANYTIME ((SO CODE IF YOUR SO UNHAPPY THE DOOR IS
OPEN
> NOW TAKE YOUR LEAVE)) I'D RATHER FACE HELLBEAST ALONE THAN HERE YOU ALL
WHINE
> EVERYDAY SO LEAVE IF ITS THAT BAD. BUT TO THOSE OF YOU THAT HAVE HELP ME
OUT
> OF SOME TIGHT SPOTS IN THE PAST KEY, PROWL, RAMULAS, BLUE, TOCAR, SNIPER
AND
> MANY WHO I CAN'T LIST RIGHT NOW THANK YOU AND IF YOU CHOOSE TO LEAVE YOU
CAN
> ALWAYS COME HERE AND HEAL.
>
> ::goes to his quarters and sit in the Cr chamber::
